data.eml:eml: The large carrion beetles (Coleoptera: Silphidae) of Turkey: a review with a new species record

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Çiftçi, Derya, Růžička, Jan, Hasbenli, Abdullah, Şahin, Ülfet (2018): The large carrion beetles (Coleoptera: Silphidae) of Turkey: a review with a new species record. Zootaxa 4441 (3): 555-591, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4441.3.10
